question: Formula 1: Who will finish ahead at the 2022 Hungarian Grand Prix, Max Verstappen or Charles Leclerc?
description:
"This is a market on whether Max Verstappen or Charles Leclerc will be the higher placed finisher at the 2022 Hungarian Grand Prix, which takes place over 70 laps of the 4.381-kilometre Hungaroring in Budapest on Sunday, July 31.

The market will resolve to “Verstappen” if Max Verstappen finishes ahead of Charles Leclerc, and “Leclerc” if Charles Leclerc finishes ahead of Max Verstappen. 

Note:
- If Max Verstappen finishes the race but Charles Leclerc does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “Verstappen”. 
- If Charles Leclerc finishes the race but Max Verstappen does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “Leclerc”. 
- If neither Charles Leclerc nor Max Verstappen finish the race before August 7 (11:59 PM ET), then the market will resolve to 50-50. 
- If for any reason the 2022 Hungarian Grand Prix is rescheduled to a different time and date on or before August 7, 2022, the same market conditions will apply. If the race is rescheduled to a time and date after August 7, 2022, this market will resolve to 50-50."

question: Will there be a Mega Millions jackpot winner on July 29?
description:
As of the publication of this market on July 29, 2022, the next estimated jackpot for the Mega Millions lottery is $1.28 billion.

The next Mega Millions drawing is scheduled for July 29, 2022, at 11 PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Mega Millions reports there is a jackpot winner for the July 29, 2022 drawing before the next scheduled drawing on August 2, 2022, 11:00:00 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from Mega Millions: https://www.megamillions.com/, however a consensus of credible reporting may be used. 

If Mega Millions reports that there was a jackpot winner as a result of the July 29, 2022 drawing before August 2, 2022, 11:00:00 PM ET, this market may resolve to "Yes" immediately. If Mega Millions reports that there were no jackpot winners for the July 29, 2022 drawing before August 2, 2022, 11:00:00 PM ET, this market may resolve to "No" immediately. If no report is made regarding a jackpot win or that no one won the jackpot as a result of the July 29, 2022 drawing, this market will resolve to "No" on August 2, 2022, 11:00:00 PM ET.

question: UFC 277: Who will win - Pena vs Nunes
description:
UFC 277 is an upcoming mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that is scheduled to take place on July 30, 2022,10:00 PM EDT, at the American Airlines Center in Dallas.

This is a market on whether Juliana Pena or Amanda Nunes will win their bout.

If Juliana Pena is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Pena”. If Amanda Nunes is declared the winner of this bout, this market will resolve to “Nunes”.

If this fight is declared a draw, or if for any reason the match is not scored, postponed after August 6, 11:59:59 PM EDT, or cancelled, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will natural gas close above $8 on August 8, 2022?
description:
If the value of natural gas is greater than $8.00 at market close according to this market's resolution source on the resolution date, August 8, 2022, this market will resolve to “Yes”. If the value of natural gas is $8.00 or less as of market close according to this market's resolution source on the resolution date, this market will resolve to “No”.

If for any reason (e.g. market holiday, emergency market closure) there is no close price for this market's resolution date, the close price of the nearest previous date will be used.

The resolution source for this market will be NASDAQ's reporting on the values offered by the New York Mercantile Exchange (NYMEX), found at (https://www.nasdaq.com/market-activity/commodities/ng:nmx/historical). The resolution will be based on the value listed in the column labelled “Close/Last” in the row titled with the resolution date.

question: Will the price of a barrel of crude oil be $100 or more on August 8, 2022?
description:
This is a market on whether the price of crude oil will be at $100.00 or higher as of market close on August 8, 2022. If the value of a barrel of oil is $100.00 or greater as of market close on the resolution date, this market will resolve to “Yes”. If the value of a barrel of oil is less than $100.00 as of market close on the resolution date, this market will resolve to “No”.  

If for any reason (e.g. market holiday, emergency market closure) there is no close price for this market's resolution date, the close price of the nearest previous date will be used.  

The resolution source for this market will be NASDAQ's reporting on the values offered by the New York Mercantile Exchange (NYMEX), found at (https://www.nasdaq.com/market-activity/commodities/cl%3Anmx/historical). The resolution will be based on the value listed in the column labelled “Close/Last” in the row titled with the resolution date.

question: Will $ETH be above $1,700 on August 5?
description:
This is a market on if the price of Ethereum (ETH) will be above $1,700 in USD on August 5, 2022 (12 PM ET).

This market will resolve to “Yes” if Ethereum (ETH) has a candlestick closing price of $1,700.01 or more, as per the resolution source, on August 5, 2022, 12 PM ET, and “No” otherwise.

The resolution source for this market will be prices listed on CoinGecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/ethereum).

This market will resolve according to the “C” (i.e. closing price) listed for the candle titled “Fri Aug 5 2022, 12:00:00”, with the “Price” tab selected, in the Eastern Time Zone. Note, this 12:00:00 candle lists the opening price for 11:30:00 AM ET and the closing price for 12:00:00 PM ET.

The check will be after the relevant candle closes. If CoinGecko is unavailable, another credible source will be chosen.
